explains: v. 概括，归纳；推广，普及；笼统地表达

sentences.en: It would be foolish to generalize from a single example.
sentences.cn: 仅从一个事例进行归纳的做法是愚蠢的。

sentences.en: It's far too risky to generalize from one set of results.
sentences.cn: 仅根据一组结果进行概括是十分不可靠的。

sentences.en: Critics love to generalize, to formulate trends into which all new work must be fitted, however contradictory.
sentences.cn: 评论家喜欢概括，归纳出所有新作品都必须符合的趋势，不管它们是如何地不符。
